titles.title: A bill to provide military commissary and exchange privileges to the surviving spouses of veterans dying from a service-connected disability.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to provide military commissary and post exchange privileges to surviving spouses of veterans who have died from a service-connected disability rated less than permanent and total. (Currently, such privileges are extended only to surviving spouses of veterans whose deaths occurred during a permanent and total service-connected disability.)
